extendedInfo.description: A simple, multi-sensory activity to teach 1 to 10 counting to pre-school children.Learning to count is one of the most fundamental skills that pre-school children aim to master. It is a universal development milestone and their first introduction to the world of mathematics. Children have a concept of numbers even before their 1st birthday and many can recite a few numbers in sequence by their 2nd birthday. By the time they enter school, children can use counting to determine the size of a set.This application demonstrates the basic concept of counting to pre-school children, the names of the numbers from 1 to 10 and their order, the fact that each item can only be used once in counting and that the order they choose to count does not alter the result. The application uses beautifully drawn images of diverse animals and an artists voice that recites the number while they are being counted. By simply touching them with their finger, children can start counting the animals as they appear on the screen. The order they touch the animals does not make a difference in the final result.We hope you and your young children enjoy the experience!

reviews.comment: My 15month old son loves this app. Its awesome! I would score it a 10 if i could!! Excellent!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Counting animal game
reviews.comment: It\'s okay 3year old son likes it a lot wish it tells, him the kinds of animals he know the numbers already but seeing them makes it even better with the yeah\'s at the end of each number gets him excited to keep going.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for toddlers and babies
reviews.comment: I like that you don\'t have to touch the animals in any order. I would like a bigger variety of animals...my son really likes it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: My son just turned 1 & what better way to teach him his numbers. He loves it! He is learning to say & recognize his numbers as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My 16m old son loves this app!!! It keeps his attention for quite a while.  I would have no problem paying for this game... If it had a child lock!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Mandie Lowry

reviews.title: One thing it needs...
reviews.comment: ...is a function so they can\'t reset to the home screen.  All the other toddler apps have it.  My daughter\'s almost 2 and loves it.  Would be 5 stars with that feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: My 18 mth old loves this. I have a video of him cheering along with his arms in the air and everything. Please make some more with colours etc. I would definitely get them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 18m old LOVES THIS
reviews.comment: Our 18m old loves this app as for the novelty of the screen reacting to his touch. It has improved his animal recognition and he is already trying to mimic counting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: This game is excellent. If it would just lock the home and back buttons so a toddler couldn\'t exit it then I\'d give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Dusteen Barber

reviews.comment: Great app but won\'t exit. Would be five stars if it did
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love
reviews.comment: love it but more praise would be nice my 2.5 yr old plays all the time
reviews.author: Amanda Hutton

reviews.comment: My 3 year old can work it easily but I do wish their was more to offer such as shapes or colors if offered more I would of gave it 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for little kids
reviews.comment: My daughter LOVES this game. If she is upset and crying she stops the minute I put this on. Is got her counting up to 10 already too which is great.
reviews.author: Scott Barnden

reviews.title: So simple it\'s great
reviews.comment: I am a primary school teacher and this app is so simple it\'s amazing! I love watching my two yr old learning one to one correspondence in such a fun way!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: My two year old is just nuts about it she can already identify all the numbers very encouraging sounds.
reviews.author: Shoeb Chandoo

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: My 2 yr old loves this app! Simple, and fun. I love that there are no ads. My daughter plays with this for ages. Well done!
reviews.author: erainai e

reviews.title: Simple but important
reviews.comment: Love this app. Simple but interesting teaches number recognition and counting and fine motor skills- pointing to each pic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was great...was
reviews.comment: My son loved this and as of today it just stopped working. All we get when it loads is just the grass background...tried uninstalling and then reinstalling and it still doesnt work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had to uninstall, couldn\'t even open it, very disappointed since others rated it so well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Effective app.
reviews.comment: My child loves counting with this game over and over again.
reviews.author: Rashanda Summers
